name: Titanium dioxide surface-treated with fluoride-modified alumina
Restrictions: Only to be used at up to 25.0 % w/w, including in the nanoform.
NotesCompliance: V29 In polar polymers which swell in contact with foods for which simulant B is assigned in Annex III, there is a risk that under severe contact conditions the migration limits for aluminium and fluoride are exceeded. Under contact conditions above 4 hours at 100 Â°C this exceedance can be high.
